title: Wrong Post Game Stats
body:
Got the wrong post game stats after an aram. Might have something to do with getting stuck waiting for stats for the previous aram and opting to skip. As you can see, the champion portraits next to the players in the upper right don't match the champions on the scoreboard on the left and neither do the summoner names.

EDIT:
Happened again, this time was a norm SR blind pick. Also the match isn't immediately recorded into match history.

replies.body: We've been working on this issue here for the last little while, and detected a faulty server that we just restarted.  Can anyone that's recently finished a game let me know if stats are appearing normally now?

Riot Hawknet, can you please find any play tech support specialist to do something about the help & support forums? There is literally a bunch of people just posting that they have problems, and most if not all of the replies are basically people wit the same problem.
Looks good now (for me), wasn't working as of right around the time you posted.

I'm now having an issue where I can't return to the homepage. I'm stuck in a "You are in a game" with only the option to reconnect, when I'm not in a game and haven't been since you disabled queues. Edit** I also only got credit for one win, when I actually won two during this error. I should have 35-45 LP but I only have 21 from just one win. Not fixed.

I played a ranked game about 30 minutes ago, Shows up in match history on the website, but not on the client, and it should have been the end of my promo series, but isnt counting the win in client. Is that recent enough hawknet, or no?

It's a good thing you disabled ranked for this!

And not for your buggy client disconnecting people and making them unable to reconnect for the past 2 weeks.
just finished a normal game on my main and stats appeared normal :D
Happened to me twice in team builder normals.  Forced to skip end game stats.  At the end of next game, you get the stats from 2 games ago (instead of the most recent game).
same exact thing just happened to me in a ranked game. no LP added and nothing about it in match history...
